request.description:
Handle patients dates of birth which are in different formats


- NHS Number: 5900017605 with DOB as 2000 (yyyy) should display DOB as 2000  
- NHS Number: 5900010260 with DOB as 2000/01 (yyyyMM), should display DOB as 2000/01  
- NHS Number: 5900011631 with DOB as 31st Feb, should not display DOB at all  
- NHS Number: 5900010384 with DOB as 2 (y), should not display DOB at all  
- NHS Number: 5900015319 with Missing DOB, should not display DOB at all

deathDate: "Death date which is empty means deceasedDateTime element is not returned",
deathDate: "Death date which contains an invalid time means deceasedDateTime element is not returned",

request.description:
Handle patients death date which could be in a different format

- NHS Number: 5900017605 with Death date as 2000 (yyyy) should display Death date as 2000  
- NHS Number: 5900010260 with Death date as as 2000/01 (yyyyMM)  
- NHS Number: 5900011631 with Death date as 31st Feb, should not display Death date at all  
- NHS Number: 5900010384 with Death date as 2 (y), should not display Death date at all  
- NHS Number: 5900015319 with Missing Death date, should not display Death date at all  
- NHS Number: 5900008142 with Invalid time for death date, should not display Death date at all
